pages.text: $(li)The Blast Furnace is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) that unlock an specific list of Smelting recipes.
$(li)If this block is placed near a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a $(l:patchouli:villagers/armorer)Armorer$(/l).

$(li)To use it, you have to insert fuel like $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/blaze_rod)Blaze Rods$(/l) in the second slot. Then, you have to add the item to Smelt in the first slot.

pages.title: Smelting Recipes
